SX0019/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFSB/BASLE/MULHOUSE VALIDITY: 03APR24 0300 - 15JUN24 0300 UTC -DESCRIPTION : THIS AIP SUP DESCRIBES THE PROGRESS OF WORK TO REPAIR PART OF TAXIWAY BRAVO, BETWEEN TAXIWAYS ECHO AND FOX. THE OPERATIONS WILL TAKE PLACE IN ONE WORK PHASE, ACTIVATED BY NOTAM. -GENERAL DISPOSITIONS : WORK CARRIED OUT AT NIGHT AND/OR DURING THE DAY. -AWO : FLIGHT PROCEDURES IN BAD WEATHER CONDITIONS (LVP) WILL NOT BE AFFECTED, BUT GROUND TAXIING WILL BE ADAPTED (STOP BARS OUT OF SERVICE). ACFT TAXIING WILL BE PARTIALLY REROUTED VIA TAXIWAY ALPHA AND THE MAIN RWY, DEPENDING ON THEIR WINGSPAN. ALL ARRIVING ACFT WILL BE PLACED BY A MARSHALL (FOLLOW-ME). - RESTRICTIONS / REGULATIONS : TRAFFIC REGULATIONS MEASURES WILL BE SET UP AND WAITING TIMES ARE TO BE EXPECTED ON ARRIVAL AND ON DEPARTURE. A35K, A388, CSM AND A346 ACFT WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED ON THE PLATFORM DURING THE CONSTRUCTION PERIOD (DUE TO GROUND TRAFFIC RESTRICTIONS). EXCEPT FOR MOVEMENTS ON THE MAIN RWY, FOUR-ENGINED ACFT WILL HAVE TO TAXI ON THE PLATFORM WITH THE OUTER ENGINES SHUT DOWN. SECONDARY RWY 07/25 WILL BE CLOSED WHEN QFU 33 IS IN USE. THE NORTH APRON WILL BE RESERVED FOR ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 44 M. CREWS OF ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 44 M MUST TAXI WITH CARE ON TAXIWAYS FOX AND GOLF AND MUST USE THE OVERSTEERING TECHNIQUE. CREWS OF ACFT WITH WINGSPANS BETWEEN 24 M AND 36 M MUST TAXI WITH CARE ON TAXIWAYS M1 AND M2 AND MUST USE THE OVERSTEERING TECHNIQUE. TAXIWAY ECHO WILL BE RESERVED FOR ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 36 M. TAXIWAY BRAVO BETWEEN 1 AND ECHO WILL BE RESERVED FOR ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 36 M. THE WORKSITE WILL BE SET UP DURING THE NIGHT BETWEEN APRIL 2 AND APRIL 3 2024.

SX0084/23 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPB/PARIS/LE BOURGET MODIFICATION AIP FRANCE AD2 LFPB REGARDING SB CONVENTIONAL DEP PROC FM PARIS - LE BOURGET FURTHER TO PTV VOR AND NDB POY EXTINCTION VALIDITY: 15JUN23- 12JUN24 VOR PTV FM THE 12/29/2022 RPLC BY THE WPT (5LNC) OLZOM, NDB POY FM 15/06/23 RPLC BY WPT OXCEL. RESULTS IN THE MODIFICATION OF THE SB CONVENTIONAL DEP PROC BASED ON THIS AID.TEMPO OPR PROC ARE IMPLEMENTED IN ORDER TO HANDLE THE SB DEP ACFT, WHILE AWAITING THE DESIGN OF NEW RNAV STD INITIAL DEP PROC - ALL SID PTV DEP LFPB ARE REMOVED. - ALL SIDS USING POY DEP FM LE BOURGET ARE AFFECTED BY THE EXTINCTION OF NDB POY. SOME INITIAL PARTS OF SID MONOT AND DORDI DEP FM LFPB ARE NOT AFFECTED AND THEREFORE REMAIN USABLE. ******************************** DEP 07/09 TO OLZOM / MONOT WITH SID LFPB 5J IN FORCE - SID CONV MONOT 5J NOT USABLE - SID DORDI 5J REMAINS USABLE - THE FLW DEP CLR CONFIRMED BY AD DELIVERY : FLW DEP SID CONV DORDI 5J CMB 3000 FT AMSL, UP TO D 17.1 NM FM MLN, THEN EXP VECTORING TO OLZOM OR MONOT - RADIOCOMMUNICATION FAILURE : SQUAWK 7600 FLW DEP SID CONV DORDI 5J CMB 3000 FT AMSL, UP TO D 17.1 NM FM MLN, THEN PCD DCT OLZOM OR MONOT COMPLY WITH THE LAST LVL CLEARED BY ATC TIL D 40 NM LOL THEN CONT THE FLT ACCORDING FPL IN FORCE ******************************** DEP 07/09 TO OLZOM / MONOT WITH SID LFPB 5M IN FORCE - SID DORDI 5M NOT USABLE - SID MONOT 5M REMAINS USABLE IN ITS INITIAL PART UP TO RADIAL 073 TSU INCLUDED. - THE FLW DEP CLR CONFIRMED BY AD DELIVERY : FLW THE INITIAL PART OF THE DEP SID MONOT 5M CMB FL 070, THEN INTERCEPT AND FLW THE 073 TSU (MAG 253), THEN PSG BT 180 RADIAL TURN LEFT MAG 190, THEN EXP VECTORING TO OXCEL THEN OLZOM OR MONOT OR DORDI - SX0177/23 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFMN/NICE/COTE EXPERIMENTATION OF 4 INITIAL APPROACH PROCEDURES TO FACILITATE OPTIMIZED DESCENTS. VALIDITY: 05OCT23 - 17APR24 THIS AIP SUP CONCERNS THE OPERATIONAL ASSESSMENT OF OPTIMIZED DESCENT PROFILES ON THE INITIAL APPROACHES (INA = INITIAL APPROACH PROCEDURE) OF FLIGHTS INBOUND FOR NICE COTE D AZUR (LFMN). AN OPTIMIZED DESCENT MEANS A DESCENT WITH REDUCED FUEL CONSUMPTION AND NOISE POLLUTION (TO DESCEND CONTINUOUSLY, TO THE GREATEST POSSIBLE EXTENT, BY EMPLOYING MINIMUM ENGINE THRUST, IDEALLY IN A LOW DRAG CONFIGURATION, PRIOR TO THE FINAL APPROACH POINT). THROUGHOUT THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THIS AIP SUP, AND WHEN CONDITIONS ALLOW (TRAFFIC, WEATHER, ETC.), THE CONTROLLER USES THE PROCEDURES PUBLISHED IN ORDER TO LIMIT RADAR VECTORING. THE CREWS, WITH THE INFORMATION OF THE DISTANCE REMAINING TO THE RUNWAY MUST PERFORM OPTIMIZED DESCENTS AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE THE OPERATIONAL ASSESSMENT WILL TAKE PLACE AT ANY TIME (DAY OR NIGHT), DURING LIGHT TRAFFIC SITUATION, ONCE THE AIRCRAFT HAS BEEN TRANSFERRED TO NICE APP. IF THE TRAFFIC SITUATION DOES NOT ALLOW THE USE OF THE TRAJECTORIES,THE PILOT SHOULD EXPECT RADAR VECTORING TOWARDS THE INITIAL FIX OF THE PROCEDURE IN USE. RNAV(GNSS) PROCEDURES: RWY04R RAPOT1M/1N RWY04L LEMPU1M/1N RWY04L/R BISBO1M/1N RWY22L/R SOTOX1M/1N

Paragraph.Text: AX0002/20 AIC RESTRICTION HLLL/TRIPOLI FIR THE PILOT OF THE AIRCRAFT OPERATING IN THE LIBYAN AIR SPACE A. THE LIBYAN CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY STRESSES THE PILOT OF AIRCRAFT OPERATING OUTSIDE THE FIELD OF HIGH COMMUNICATIONS FOR THE NECESSITY OF USING VHF/ RT RANGE .RADIO FREQUENCY ASSIGNED TO EXCHANGE INFORMATION BETWEEN PILOTS VHF AIR / AIR VOLINTARY REPORT. B. FOR MORE COORDINATION BETWEEN THE OPPOSING AIR TRAFFIC, ESPECIALLY THOSE OPERATING OUTSIDE THE CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, IN ORDER TO ENSURE THE SAFETY OF AIR NAVIGATION IN THE LIBYAN AVIATION TERRITORY AND THE MENTIONED RADIO FREQUENCIES ARE: 1- WHEN FLYING AT OR BELOW THE FLYING LEVEL FL200 FREQUENCY 123.5 MHZ 2- WHEN FLYING ABOVE A FLIGHT LEVEL FL200 FREQUENCY 126.9 MHZ C. THIS AUTHORITY ALSO STRESSES THE NEED TO OBTAIN PRIOR PERMISSION FOR FLIGHTS BEFORE TAKING OFF FROM AIRPORTS THAT ARE NOT SUBJECT TO THE MAJOR AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL CENTERS IN TRIPOLI AND ITS BRANCH IN BENGHAZI BY WAY OF HIGH-FREQUENCY RADIO
